inn1.comm: Imrul beaten trying to drive outside the off stump
tapped back towards mid-off, Imrul was almost squared up there
Imrul drives towards point, no run there
lofted over mid-off and Muzurabani could only get a finger on that. First boundary of the innings.
tapped towards cover for a quick single, and the throw is at the non-strikers end but Kayes dives nonetheless. The throw misses the stumps.
Tamim drives down the ground and the ball races to the boundary after missing the right of mid-off
Tamim charges and slams it past Tinashe at mid-on for four
TP brings it in now getting Tamim to defend from the crease ... good comeback
Tamim charges at the bowler again and manages to squirt it to third man, he was in control of that though
swatted away through the vacant midwicket region for four, a back of a length which allowed Tamim dispatched with an elegant pull
fullish on middle and leg, turned away towards square leg
played with soft hands towards cover and sets off for a quick single immediately. Good run that.

too full on middle, Imrul skips down the track and heaves it off the inside half of the bat towards deep midwicket. Did not get anwhere close to that but went through with the stroke and with this lightning quick outfield, it races away to the boundary
back of a length on middle, Tamim stands tall in his crease and swivel-pulls off just one foot to backward square leg where Waller cuts it in
shortish on middle, played off the back foot into the leg side, he wants one but there is none to be had
wider outside off now, better line. Kayes looks to play this down to third man but is beaten

just a thin feather and Tamim has to go. Excellent lines and lengths these. Fuller than a good length just outside off and Tamim naughtily flirts at that with a defensive prod. He gets a thin outside edge which is easily accepted by the keeper
fullish outside off, Kayes looks to throw his hands at it but gets a thick outside edge to third man
blocked off the front foot
too full but straight, a mis-timed drive travels to mid-on
full outside off, left alone watchfully
good length outside off, cut without much feet movement to point
punchy drive off the back foot, powerful stroke but finds the fielder at cover
badly mis-times a drive to mid-off. Stayed in his crease, did not move his feet and drove away from his body. Poor technique from Imrul
good length on off and middle, nice tight lines. All Imrul can do is defensively pat it back towards mid-on

what a shot that is. Why show technique when you can play like this. Full on off, Kayes gets one foot to the pitch of the ball, and launches a drive over mid-on. Clears the boundary by a few metres. Did not bother keeping that down at any time.
this time it is Liton. Full outside off and Liton shuffles across and swats deep into the midwicket stand. Almost swept for six. Such was his power and timing.
once again he tries to repeat the slog sweep off the fast bowler, but the ball is closer to him and he can only inside edge towards the keeper
better shot. Offers the full face of the bat to drive to cover. A bit overpitched outside off and the ball was there to drive though
dabbed to third man with the open face
ooh, beauty. That nipped back in off the pitch and cut Liton in half as he tried to defend. The keeper too is beaten by the prodigious movement and fumbles but no run
good length outside off, some good lines here barring the wide. Left well alone

Liton has to go, he tries to pull a delivery from well outside off to the leg side and was in no control of his shot. The ball keeps rising and gets a thin edge which is taken by the keeper over his head. Not a good shot that.
good delivery, tailing back in and straight. Blocked with the angle to mid-on
slightly leg side-ish and some extras for Bangladesh. Good length on Kayes' pads who misses his flick,  but the ball rolls to the fine leg boundary off his thigh pad
good length outside off, Kayes stands tall and punches a drive to deep cover
inside-halved to midwicket. Full outside off and Madmudullah looks to drive but the ball jags in a touch, taking the  ball to midwicket instead
pushed to point off the front foot
good length outside off, Mahmudullah stays on the back foot and crunches a drive to cover

uppishly pummeled past cover. Fullish length and wide outside off, Kayes stays in his crease, doesn't quite get to the pitch but goes through with the stroke. Most importantly, he finds the gap to the right of mid-off
ripper. Good length outside off and moves away, maybe hit the seam too. It climbs and beats the outside edge by a distance
good length again outside off, steered with the open face
fuller than a good length, creamed to cover but no feet movement yet again
just turned off his pads and that almost gets to the boundary. Exemplary timing mixed with a quick outfield takes it close to the square leg boundary.
good length outside off, honing in on that off bail. Pushed to point
back of  a length on leg, whipped to midwicket. Missed opportunity there.
fishes at that and Imrul is beaten yet again. Good delivery outside off, climbs as it reaches Imrul who looks to guide this to third man, beaten

he gets some bat on that and a boundary to finish a good over. Shortish length outside off, Kayes doesn't learn from his previous mistake, he goes through with the shot and gets a thick outside edge which flies over the diving keeper
flat from around the wicket on leg, no turn, clipped to short fine leg
some turn there and lots of it, so early in the day. Hits Mahmudullah on the body as he tries to block
drifts down leg, wide called
pushed wider outside off, driven to cover off the front foot
slightly short and wide, Mahmudullah shapes to cut but the ball skids on and is beaten on the cut
flight on off, nudged towards deep square leg
flatter and wide, cut off the back foot to point
slow through the air outside off, Mahmudullah opens the face of the bat to guide the ball through cover
tossed up on off, Mahmudullah skips down the track and meets the ball as it pitches, drives with the turn to long-on
rank long hop and dispatched. Kayes stays on the back foot and pulls powerfully over midwicket. Picked the length early and smashed it.
sweeps but doesn't connect too well, travels to deep midwicket

Mahmudullah has to go now. The third batsman to edge to the keeper. He tries to run one off the face to third man but another edge, and the keeper takes another. Bangladesh are in a bit of trouble now
Mushfiqur is off the mark with an on-drive to long-on
slightly shortish and wide, Kayes rocks back and flays a cut to deep point
turned to short fine leg
fired down leg, wide called
nicely tossed up, Mushy plays inside the line and drills a drive with the spin to long-off
massive hit. He advances and gets to the pitch of the ball, once he did that he had all the confidence to loft the ball very high over long-off. Terrific stroke
inside-edged to square leg
strays down leg and Mushy works this to the fine leg region for a couple.
tossed up on off, driven to cover
that is fifty for kayes. He goes down to sweep but may have got a bit of pad. Nonetheless, there is a single and he celebrates his fifty
swatted through midwicket to the fine leg fielder
through the sweep too early, and the ball lobs past slip off the back of the bat. Lucky for Kayes.
turned with the spin to square leg
slowish on leg, clipped to deep square leg
slogged over midwicket. He gets down early and sweeps nicely. Signature shot when in trouble but with so much flight, he was always safe
shortish on middle, pulled to deep midwicket
dances down the track and pushes the ball back to the bowler
pushed to long-on off the front foot
picked the gap nicely there, a perfect illustration of the gaps present in overs 10-40. Short on middle, Kayes rocks back and mis-times a pull to midwicket but no one is there and they get a boundary
worked off his pads to deep square leg off the front foot
closes the face on that and whips the ball to midwicket
too flat and short on leg, pulled fine to deep backward square leg
terrific batting, picked his gap and executed to perfection. Got down early and paddle-swept the full toss very delicately to the fine leg boundary
googly on middle, Mushy stays back and blocks
flicked to short fine leg, Rahim sends an enthusiastic Kayes back, clearly no run there
driven with the spin to long-on
leading edge falls well short of cover. Closes the face too quickly as he tries to nudge to the leg side
tossed up but well down leg
advances down the track and goes inside-out, along the ground past cover for a couple. Clever stroke
attempts the reverse-sweep but the ball spins too much and hits him on the body after kissing his glove
punched back to the bowler
nicely driven with the spin to long-on, didn't panic after a few dot balls
shortish and wide, Mushy cuts to short third man
flat and quick on leg, clipped to deep square leg
some spin, bowled from wider of the crease, the ball spins and grips in the pitch, beats Mushy's flick and hits him high on the pad
aah, poor delivery. Full toss on off, Rahim makes some room and goes inside-out over cover. Doesn't need to thread the gap, he goes over the fielder
makes some room and drives through the cover region

he is gone, huge wicket for Zim. Tossed up outside off, Rahim comes down and looks to go over cover but doesn't get to the pitch, the ball spins a tad and takes the outside edge towards short third man. The lob is well taken by the fielder
cut to point off the back foot
tossed up on middle, whipped to square leg
poor delivery to start, Kayes goes down to sweep this delivery which is full and down leg, he is through the shot too early and the ball hits the back of the bat and rolls to the fine leg boundary
driven with the turn to long-off
almost gone. Rahman turns the ball to square leg, and Kayes comes running down thinking there was a single but is sent back. he dives full length but the ball misses the stumps
blocked off the front foot
worked to short fine leg off the front foot
fired down leg and Sabbir gets a boundary. Full but on Rahman's legs who gets it fine with a nice delicate sweep.
full on leg, blocked. A good bit of flight
advances and tries to hit that over cover but the ball is delivered a touch shorter after the premeditated charge, Kayes manages to improvise and hit the uppish cut wide of extra cover
poor delivery yet again, full and fast on leg. Rahman gets down early and plays a fine sweep and the ball beats the short fine leg fielder.
turn. Flight on off, Kayes closes the face of the bat and looks to flick but the ball rips past his outside edge
flat, short and wide, cut to deep point
terrific strike. Picked his delivery to charge, got to the pitch of the ball with some nimble use of the feet and lofted a powerful stroke over long-on
he smokes a full toss straight down the fielder's throat. Comes down the track and smashes a full toss right to Cremer at long-off. He is distraught as he walks off
slowish on off, solidly defended off the back foot
whipped off his pads to deep square leg

sloppy fielding from the fielder at the midwicket boundary. Long hop on middle and Rahman pulls powerfully but straight to midwicket who partially stops it but allows the ball to sneak through the hands
slowish and wide, nice drift and loop. The ball spins outside off and rips past the outside edge
flat on off, punched to cover
slower on off, cut off the front foot to point, not much feet movement
full outside off, Rahman opens the face to get the ball in front of cover for a quick single
too full on off and middle, pushed to mid-on for a quick single. Good run there
short outside off, Nasir cuts to third man but not in total control of that
good length outside off, patted down towards point

no run there, almost a run out. Full on middle, turned towards square leg and the pair think there is a single on offer, Nasir is sent back just in time and even though there is a direct hit, all is good
shortish length on middle, swivel-pulled to deep square leg
nicely played. Back of a length outside off, finely dabbed to third man
fullish length outside off, flat-batted to deep cover
defensively pushed back at the bowler
full on middle, clipped towards the vacant midwicket region
nicely driven off the front foot towards deep cover
chopped to gully off the front foot
drifts down leg and another extra. All vital runs these
fired down leg, just kisses the pads on the way to the keeper
full and dropped. That is a hard chance. Smashed back at the bowler who stuck out a hand and couldn't hold on.
beautifully played, goes back and delicately plays the upper cut to the third man boundary
clipped to deep fine leg
pushed to the left of point and they complete a relatively easy single
fullish on leg, tickled in the gap at backward square leg, he picked the gap nicely and completed an easy two.
drifts down leg and another wide called
rides the bounce well and keeps his punch down, gets a single through cover
dabbed with soft hands towards third man
slower ball outside off and ends up being overpitched, drilled but cover gets around and puts in a diving stop
slower but a tad shorter on leg, Nasir comes down and works the ball wider off square leg for a single. Good improvisation
pushed with soft hands towards cover for a quick run
short on middle, Nasir rocks back to pull but the ball keeps a tad low and he adjusts well to hit to deep midwicket
full but down leg, wide called
loopy delivery on leg, Sabbir smothers the spin and blocks
starts with a leg side-ish delivery that is tickled to fine leg
short and wide, should have been put away, Sabbir hits the fielder at cover
delicately guided to third man off the open face
fierce cut goes to third man, a bit too full to play that shot
outside edge - a thick one - runs to the third man fielder
smeared to long-on, he runs down and looks to go down the ground but skews it off the inside half of the bat
driven with the turn to long-on. A bit too much flight from Cremer
clobbered to deep midwicket who keeps them down to one. Good fielding.
huge appeal, not given. Nasir tried to reverse-sweep that but e got a bit of bat on that and the umpire gives it a run too. Would have been close had he misses it
and Sabbir goes! Opportune wicket for Zim, too full outside off, Rahman goes for a full-blooded drive but the ball kisses the outside edge and the keeper takes another catch.
the towel falls off just before delivery. Fullish outside off, quelled to point
clobbered past mid-off. Fullish delivery outside off, Nasir picks the length and dispatches the delivery past the diving fielder
full and straight, clipped to midwicket off the back foot
fractionally short on off, Nasir punches a single to long-on and raises the hosts' 200
hint of turn outside off, steered behind point
flat darter on off and middle, forced to long-on
straight roller on a length, poked back to the bowler
Williams gives this more air on off, Mashrafe camps back and defends it back to the bowler
full and attacking the off stump, Nasir's defence intervenes
similar line and length, defensively patted back to the bowler
fractionally short, top-of-off line, gingerly blocked back to the bowler
Nasir wants to loosen the shackles. He skips out, but Panyangara shortens his length. Slashed to deep third man off a thick outside edge
back of a length and outside off, dabbed wide of a diving backward point
turned from a off-stump line in front of midwicket
comes down the track and just pushes the ball towards cover
terrific shot! Picked the flight, comes down and presents the full face of the bat to smash the ball down the ground. One-bounce boundary
flat on off. pushed to point. A bit of miscommunication but the batsmen both make their respective ends
criminal and the crowd goes berserk. a spinner has overstepped. Turned to short fine leg
he makes some room but the ball stops in the pitch, and he can only drag the ball to long-off.
quicker through the air, pushed defensively back to the bowler who has inexplicably fumbled and allowed the ball to go through. May have taken his eyes off at the last moment
no one out there to patrol the off side boundary and Nasir goes over the infield. Slow short delivery outside off, asking to be hit and Nasir takes full toll.
swivel-pulled to deep square leg, just a hint short
good length outside off, clipped to long-on to give Nasir the strike

streaky boundary but they'll take whatever they can get. TP sees Nasir backing away and fires a quick wide yorker, Nasir reaches out for it and gets a little bit of bat, may have been an edge too to beat the diving keeper
calmly pushed to long-on
low full toss outside off, tip and run cricket, Mash pushes to cover for one
nice batting from Mash this. Gets bat on it and guides the ball to point for one
slower delivery outside off, powered to long-on off the back foot
short delivery on leg, Mash tries to pull but the ball kisses his glove and goes to short fine leg
yorker down leg, but Muzarabani follows the backing away Nasir. He can only block
slower yorker yet again, Nasir gives himself room and can only skew the ball to long-on

Mash chooses the last delivery to go for the expansive shot. Not bad cricket but execution was lacking. Back of  a length outside off, Mashrafe flat-bats the pull but doesn't get all of it. The ball lobs to long-off for a simple catch.
full on middle, turned to square leg for one
full and wide, Nasir backs away and mis-times his drive to cover
fuller length on off, Test-match length. Pushed to point for a quick single. A direct hit would have resulted in a  run-out

cracked to the fielder at deep midwicket. What a sound that made but he has picked out the fielder to inch-perfection. Ervine did not have to move to take that. Takes it just inside the boundary too. Short on off, Nasir stays in his crease and creams this pull but he has to go
good length outside off, beaten
full and wide, driven to cover
wide yorker, good bowling. Somehow, Sunny got some bat on that and guided this to third man
good short ball, the ball lobs up off the glove towards the keeper but the ball lands short of the keeper. They get one though

splendid fielding. What a catch that is. Full and wide, Sunny mis-times a drive towards cover but fails to keep it down, Ervine runs to his right, dives full-length and holds on to leave Bangladesh in further trouble
slower delivery outside off, Al-Amin misses his hoick
lucky runs but Mustafiz will take it. He backs away and throws his hands at it, gets a thick outside edge which flies past the keeper for four
short ball on off, Mustafiz backs away and wildly goes after that, Completely misses
bouncer on off, MR is still backing away but the ball rushes onto him and he is very late on the upper cut
heaved with all his might, but the ball trickles to square leg for one
full and wide, missed
another wide yorker, another miss to end the innings

inn2.comm: good start from both sides, a bit of swing. Full and swinging in to Chibhabha who flicks it confidently towards mid-on for a quick single
massive appeal but not given.  Pitched just outside leg, good decision. Skidded on to Chakabva who misses his flick and was struck right in front. Good start for Mustafiz
fullish length on off, defended confidently towards cover, he wants one but isn't there
fullish on off, solidly blocked off the front foot
drifts down leg, clips the thigh pad on its way to fine leg
a bit of swing away from the batsman, on a fuller length but left alone
drifts down leg yet again, and this will be five for Zim. Bounces just in front of Mushy who couldn't do anything, skirted along the floor after pitching and away for runs
aah nice. Full and swinging away but this is closer to off stump, Chakabva fishes at it and is beaten
too straight on middle and leg, whipped with his toes off the ground towards square leg. indications that Mustafizur is hustling Chibhabha for pace
nice run, a little risky but they make it. fullish on off, he pushes towards mid-off with soft hands and sets off immediately. They just about make it but there is a fumble while picking up
mis-timed but races away for four. Fractionally short outside off, CC rocks back and pulls through midwicket. It is in the gap and away for four
that goes for six! signs of a positive mindset. Too full on middle and Chamu gets under it and lofts that easily over long-on, carries the distance too.
leading edge just evades cover. lucky for CC. He went to flick into the leg side but that was Mustafiz's signature offcutter which turned, caught the outside edge and carried over cover
almost hit wicket. What happened there? Mortaza bowls on a fullish length on middle, Chakabva defends but loses the bat and falls just wide of the stumps. Lucky break
full on off, steered to gully
another leg bye, a bit too leg side-ish and the ball goes towards square leg
skids on with the arm outside off, Chakabva gets bat on that late
that is plumb. Straighter and skids on with the arm and strikes Chakabva right in front. No spin but Chakabva is playing for some. And a horror innings for Chakabva ends
starts this well down leg and a wide called
clipped with the turn to square leg

bowled im now. Nips back in just a tad, Chibhabha brings the bat down at an angle and that results in a slightly skewed bat-face, a thick inside edge clatters into the stumps and Zim are now two down.

inside-edge just past the stumps. Whew, that was close. Full and angling away from the left-hander who played a hesitant drive, away from his body, leaving a huge gap between bat and pad. Sneaks through.
good length on middle, defended back
full on middle and leg, blocked off the front foot
nice drive. Too full on middle and Williams executes a crisp drive past the bowler and the stumps. This outfield all you need to do is find the gap and Williams does that. He gets four
length delivery outside off, outside edge goes towards third man for one
very very close but not given. Fuller than a good length on middle, Williams is playing back to it and misses, the ball strikes him on the back leg but a lot of doubt. Umpire Aleem says no.
steered to third man off the outside half of the bat
another outside edge and another boundary. Fullish outside off and Ervine prods defensively at it and gets a thick outside edge which evades slip and into the third man boundary
full and wide to start, punished by Williams. He stays in his crease and creams a square drive through the covers for four
full and wide outside off, Williams goes after that and gets a thick outside edge to third man

another inside-edge just misses the stumps. Pretty loose cricket. Fullish but on a fifth-stump line, Ervine throws his hand sat it and leaves a massive gap between bat and pad. Again, the batsman is lucky
outside off on a full length, Williams' turn to be loose. Flays at that from his crease, with minimal feet movement and the ball goes past the outside edge
wow, some really loose cricket here. Full and wide, Ervine drives away from his body, the ball jags back in and a thick inside-edge hits his back leg and they get one
did not quite pick the length of that delivery but played it well in the end. Fuller than a good length outside off, Williams goes back and keeps it out
short and wide, cut straight to point. Should have been put away
too full and wide, Ervine chooses to leave and a  wide is called

and he goes! What a soft dismissal that is. Full on off, it may have been an offcutter and Williams goes after that and inside-halves it to the man at short midwicket. Poor shot and the loose cricket continues.
good length ball on middle and off, defended gently to point
gets a little cut back into the left-hander, Ervine is surprised by it. A little extra bounce as well. Struck just below his stomach
terrific stroke. He leans on that and caresses a drive through covers for four. Brilliant timing and the ball races across
full on a fourth-stump line. Ervine presents the full face of the bat to block
back of a length on off, Chigumbura punches the ball towards point. The backward point fielder runs across, gets in the way of point and misfields. An extra run
leading edge, just short of Mustafiz in his follow through. The offcutter again on a back of a length gets Ervine hopping and jumping off the back foot
another huge appeal. Lots and lots happening here. Cuts Ervine in half. Full outside off and the offcut is responsible for that movement into the left-hander, defeating the batsman
shortish outside off, steered to third man off the back foot
fullish on off, not much turn, blocked
skids on to Ervine who nudges the ball towards square leg
turned to short fine leg
cuts him in half, jags back in off the pitch yet again. Ervine plays back but the late movement beats him all ends up on the inside edge
nice single. Full outside off, played with soft hands towards cover and they get a quick run.
back of a length on off and middle, inside-edged onto his body
ooh, was that a slower bouncer? Whatever the pace on it, Chigumbura was forced to smell the leather. Whizzed past his face as he dropped his wrists to play it outside off
good shot. Releases the pressure with a quality shot. dances down the track and belts it over long-on. Got to the pitch nicely and connected well too
pushed defensively to point
turned off the front foot to midwicket
offers a bit of width and Ervine blasts a cut to deep point
fuller length outside off, Chigs hangs back and punches to cover
slower legcutter outside off, good variation. Chigs is beaten by the change in pace but adjusts well to hit to cover
gets down early to play the sweep and executes nicely too. Played that fine
slower on middle and leg, punched to long-on off the back foot
slower outside off, Ervine leans into the drive and opens the face to get the ball towards cover
a bit short on off, Chigs goes back and drills a punch drive to long-on
charges down the track and pushes the ball to long-on with soft hands
shortish and wide, punished towards point but  a diving stop ensures there is just one
crashed through the off side, towards deep cover
good looking drive to cover. Made a good sound off the bat
fired in down leg, tickled to fine leg
skids on with the arm outside off, blocked
short on middle, Ervine rocks back and smashes a pull to deep midwicket. Terrific stroke
almost sneaks through. Skids on with the arm outside off, an inside edge almost lobs up for Mushy
dances down and drives to long-on
gets down early to sweep but misses and is struck outside off, just misses the stumps too
tossed up outside off, worked with the spin to long-on
Nasir sees Ervine advancing and fires on leg, Ervine nudges to backward square
worked in the gap through midwicket for one
opens the face to find the gap through cover

that is close, poor run from Ervine. Excellent fielding from Liton at mid-off. And Ervine has to go. Pushed wider outside off and Ervine is already down the track but doesn't get close to the pitch, since he is already a few feet down, he judges the run to be there and goes through with it. Liton is quick on it and fires in an accurate throw at the non-strikers end. Ervine has to go
pushed with the spin to long-off
lands just short of long-off. Exuberant is one adjective. Runs down and looks to pummel this down the ground but doesn't get close to the pitch yet again. Skews the ball
skids on to leg, rolls towards short fine leg off the thigh pad for one
punched to long-on off the back foot
pushed back to the bowler after a couple of steps down the track
a bit short on middle and leg, turned to midwicket

too tight a run. Full delivery outside off, Chigumbura pads up after not getting to the pitch and calls for the run as it goes towards extra cover. The fielder is quick on it and fires in a throw which misses the stumps, would have been out with a direct hit
nice shot. A little too positive maybe but he executes well enough. dances down and gets to the pitch and importantly, plays with the spin over long-off for six
pushed to deep cover off the back foot
through the off side for four. A little too short but Raza gives himself room and cuts nicely in the gap for four through covers
down leg and tickled fine towards backward square leg, a stumble from the fielder allows them the second. Good running
fired on leg, whipped to square leg where there is an excellent diving stop. And a quick return too, but Raza is home
short on off, Chigs backs away and flays a cut to deep cover
gets to the pitch and smokes a drive to long-on. Good batting, higher percentage shots these
races off his leg and goes for four. Straying down leg and some pad gets some runs for Zim
full on off, Raza opens the face and finds the gap through cover
a bit too full and powerfully driven to mid-off, they race across for one
fuller than a good length and wide, left alone
full on leg, defended back
slower on off, defended
there it is. A bit short on off, Chigs goes back and drills through long-off for one
runs down the track and hits a drive to long-on
short on off, Raza goes back and pushes the ball to deep cover
a bit too full on off, pushed to the left of mid-on for an easy run
driven in the gap through covers for another single
nice running, Raza looking good here. Half-volley on off, Raza pushes to the left of mid-on again, but there is a fumble allowing them the second
a leg bye rolls towards square leg after hitting Chigumbura's pads
guided to gully
terrific delivery. Quick offcutter outside off, Chigs looks to guide that to short third man but the ball misses the outside edge
nice short delivery. Quick outside off, Chigs is forced to sway out of the line
pushed wider outside off, Chigumbura leaves and a wide is called by umpire Dar
around the wicket, a thick outside edge goes in between keeper and gully, towards third man for one
inside-edge just evades the stumps, rolls next to it in fact and they scamper a quick run
a bit wider outside off, Raza blazes a cut to the sweeper cover
fullish on off, pushed past the bowler for a quick single
better from Mustafiz. Quick offcutter rips past Raza's outside edge, nothing he could have done with that
fullish outside off, skewed off the front foot between point and gully for one
slower offcutter yet again but a bit too wide outside off
defended off the front foot
steered to deep cover off the front foot
picks it up early and dispatches that. Splendid shot. puts the pressure back on Mash. He advances and murders this back over the bowler's head
loose from the fielders now, sloppy fielding. Tucked away off his hips and the fielders at short fine leg and deep square leg mess up the chase
thick under edge and there is four more for Chigs. Just a bit full outside off, Chigumbura is hanging back and cuts, but a massive under edge goes to the third man boundary
slow on off, defended
uses his feet nicely to get to the pitch and drill to long-off with the spin
ooh, that lobbed over the bowler. That bounced out of nowhere, he pushed at it and the ball spun and took the outside half of the bat and lobbed over the bowler
Raza gets down early and plays a fine sweep to the fine leg boundary. Four more, runs leaking suddenly
caressed to cover off the back foot
smashed with a flat-bat to deep cover
good bouncer on that occasion. Raza gets under it
cut off the back foot to point

and the drinks break does the trick. Loss in concentration does it for Raza. Short outside off, Raza looks to flat-bat a pull over midwicket but the ball gets too big on him and he ends up slicing it to mid-on. Simple catch and a timely wicket for Bangladesh.
comes down the track and drives to long-off
drives with the spin into the gap towards long-on, with the full face of the bat
a bit of tail, angled into off and middle but Chigs pushes confidently to long-on
legcutter, terrific delivery. Beats the outside edge
steered to third man off the outside half of the bat

out, massive wicket for Bangladesh. Poor delivery, slower legcutter outside off, Chigumbura goes for the ramp over third man but doesn't get all of it, he uppishly cuts it and third man runs in and holds onto a sharp chance.
good bouncer on middle. Jongwe gets under it
good length on middle and leg, Waller stays back and pats the ball into the leg side
almost sneaks through. Too full on off, Waller keeps it out though with a defensive stroke

dropped, very hard chance but a chance nonetheless. Full down leg and Waller gets a bit of bat on it, Rahim dives full length but can't hold on. They get the run too as the ball bursts out of the gloves
strays down leg again and another wide
huge appeal but not given, no sound as it passed.  A bit short outside off, Waller goes back and tries to punch but misses
pushed with soft hands towards cover, they scamper through for one
dabbed to gully, that legcutter is rearing up from Al-Amin.
good length outside off, steered to third man
short delivery, but way over the batsman's head and the wide is called
charge and miss. Forces the batsman to advance but the ball is of good length outside off, missed
another advance and another miss. He mindlessly runs at the bowler, the experienced Mash hits the deck at a shortish length and the ball whistles past that outside edge
slogged for four. Unorthodox but he will not care. Fullish outside off, Jongwe gets down early and plays a slog sweep over midwicket for four.
that is much better, chopped to third man
turned to deep square leg
shortish on middle and leg, whipped to square leg
nurdled away off his pads to that square leg region yet again
drilled to long-on after advancing down the track
nice reverse sweep over point for two, Nasir cuts it off just in front of the boundary. Got down early and got underneath it nicely too.
skids on to Jongwe's pads but he is struck down leg, and then goes to third man
uppishly cuts past point, a bit too short outside off on that occasion
quick down leg, Waller misses. May have kissed the pad on the way to Rahim

outside edge and taken by Rahim. Too short outside off and Waller rocks back and tries to power the ball through the covers but gets a thin outside edge which is well taken by Rahim standing up. Just chippin' away at these wickets are Bangladesh
pushed back to the bowler defensively
overpitched on leg, smeared to deep midwicket

bowled im. Finally, Mustafizur hits the stumps.  A quick offcutter and the off stump is uprooted. A bit too full but Jongwe misses and the stumps are rattled. Is that the final nail in the coffin? The crowd goes wild
that quick offcutter outside off, snakes past the outside edge. No clue of that had TP
down leg and four. Poor delivery. Full down leg, TP walks across and just gets some bat on that to the fine leg boundary.
another delivery which just beats that outside edge. The offcutter causing problems yet again

and another, Zimbabwe are capitulating now. Short outside off, TP looks to pull into the leg side but the ball hurries onto him and deviates a touch too. Spoons up for Mash at point and Zim are nine down
huge appeal  but a very optimistic shout. Full down leg strikes Muzarabani well down leg
run-out chance missed. Pushed closer to slip and they go for the single. Mushy shouts bowler, bowler. But the throw is to the keeper
and that will be it. Easy win for Bangladesh and they complete the series win and a 2-0 lead in the series. Cremer runs past one as he tries to find some runs and Rahim does the rest.
